<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Reef Octopus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=745)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The common reef octopus is a risky but valuable catch for coastal fishers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Reef Octopus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=745)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 187 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +7; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Resistances**
cold 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, swim 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +9 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d10+1 piercing plus reef octopus venom

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
arm +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Camouflage**   The reef octopus can change the color of its skin to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) even if it doesn't have cover.

**Ink Cloud** <actions string="Single Action" />  The reef octopus emits a cloud of dark-brown ink in a 10-foot emanation. This cloud has no effect outside of water. Creatures inside the cloud are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) and can't use their sense of smell. The cloud dissipates after 1 minute. The octopus can't use Ink Cloud again for 2d6 rounds.

**Jet** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The reef octopus moves up to 80 feet in a straight line through the water without triggering reactions.

**Reef Octopus Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 17 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage and flat-footed (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d8 poison damage and flat-footed (1 round)

**Writhing Arms** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The reef octopus makes up to four arm Strikes with different arms, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the octopus's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all of its attacks.

</column>
